contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|dispense|dispenser|dispensers|dispensor}} {{Commons category|Dispensers}} A '''dispenser''' is something that doles out things. '''Dispenser''' may refer to: {{tocright}} ==Devices== ===Candy=== * [[Klik Rockets Dispenser]], a candy dispenser * [[Pez dispenser]], a candy dispenser ===Hygiene=== * [[Automatic toothpaste dispenser]], a device used to contain and dispense toothpaste * [[Paper-towel dispenser]], a device that dispenses paper towels * [[Soap dispenser]], a device that, when manipulated or triggered appropriately, yields soap ===Medicine=== * [[Hearing aid dispenser]], an entity that sells hearing aid * [[Pill dispenser]], items which release medication at specified times ===Other uses=== * [[Cash dispenser]], automated teller machine * [[Label dispenser]], machines built to simplify the process of removing a label from its liner or backing tape * [[Tape dispenser]], an object that holds a roll of tape and has a mechanism at one end to shear the tape * [[Vending machine]]s, which dispense beverages, candy, chips, sandwiches, and other foods * [[Wine dispenser]], a device designed to serve and preserve wines ==People== * [[Le Despenser]], a surname, most commonly associated with Norman-English barons * [[Dylan Dispenser Walker]] ==See also== * {{lookfrom}} * {{intitle}} * [[Dispensation (disambiguation)]] * [[Dispensor (Transformers)]], fictional robot * [[Dispensing (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
